card.name: Cashback
card.info: Customers are more likely to pay by card

card.name: Fast checkout
card.info: Customers buy no more than 5 products

card.name: Complete Trust
card.info: There is no "anti-thief" on the goods

card.name: Build to last
card.info: The computer does not throw an error

card.name: Endless roll
card.info: The check roll won't run out

card.name: Couponless
card.info: Customers dont ask to scan a coupon

card.name: All my goods are with me
card.info: Buyers do not ask for a bag
